Assistant Project and Maintenance Officer
Hospital Authority - Hong Kong
Hospital Authority

Ref: KCC1812074

Post Date: 28 Dec 18

Position: Executive Assistant I


Office: Facility Management Department


Hospital: Kwong Wah Hospital & TWGHs Wong Tai Sin Hospital


Pay: HK$19,260 - HK$22,788 per month


Responsibilities:

1.Provide executive support on maintenance and improvement projects undertaking by various works agents to the hospital.


2.Provide executive support to the hospital administration related to Facilities Management (FM) including but not limited to FM procurement, maintenance contract/ tender specification preparation and projects issues.


3.Liaise with parties concerned for the expedient provision of service.


4Co-ordinate with healthcare end-users and control of outsourced consultants and contractors to ensure quality services.


5.Assist in maintaining site safety and occupational safety and health issues and site work correspondences.


6.Prepare status reports for hospital management.


7.Assist in planning and monitoring projects including progress monitoring and cashflow management.


8.Carry out other duties as assigned by supervisor(s).


Entry Requirements:


1.University Graduates with experience; OR



1.Good command of English and Chinese language.

2.Working Experience in healthcare setting, property management, building consultancy/ contracting.


3.Degree in Building Services, Mechanical, Electrical, Environmental Engineering/Building Study/ Building Surveying/ Construction Discipline or equivalent

For All Applicants

5. May be required to work outside normal office hours, work shift and irregular hours, and attend duties during typhoon, black rainstorm warnings and other emergencies.

6. May be required to work in another work location to meet service needs of the HA.
